title: Crashing
body:
Hey My computer continually crashes but only on league of legends champion select. I can reboot my comp and get back into the game and play everything out like nothing happened however I miss the first 3-4 minutes of the game depending on how long the reboot takes. it gives me the WHEA_UNCORRECTABLE_ERROR message when it crashes. I can play Smite fine and other games like Terraria, Minecraft, wow and actually playing league has no Issues it's just the champ select and it crashes my computer every single time. Any help or suggestions would be greatly appreciated thnx.

System Spec:

Manufacturer: Acer

Model: Aspire XC-703

Processor: Intel(R) Pentium(R) CPU J2900 @ 2.41 GHZ

Installed memory (RAM): 4.00 GB (3.88 GB usable)

System type: 64-bit Operating System, x64-based processor

Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics

I know pretty crappy but it does the Job for now at least.

replies.body:
The error you're seeing is often caused by corrupt or missing drivers. I strongly recommend your first step to be updating your drivers off of [Acer's website](http://www.acer.com/ac/en/US/content/drivers). 

If you still have issues after working through those steps, let me know.
OK so it worked for 2 or so days now I am back to crashing on the champion select and there are no more Updates for my driver.
wow it worked lmao. my computer didn't auto update so a little weird, also i now run it as admin as well and it works fine thanks. ^^
